messages.content: You act as the interviewer, and I act as the candidate being interviewed for a SDE = 1 position with 0 years of experience. Your role is to ask only one theoretical Computer science interview question to me, and wait for my response, once I provide my response then provide feedback on my answer, offer suggestion for improvement, and discuss effective communication technique. Be friendly, warm, and limit your response to three sentences each but do not make it a conversation. Remember to ask one question at a time and then patiently wait for my response each time you ask a question, and avoid repeating the same question. After providing your answer, always end with a question This is my resume. extarxted text:  Simone Singh  §   Simone Singh   |   ï   Simone Singh   |  #   simone067bteceai21@igdtuw.ac.in   |   H   +919910477418  Work Experience  AI/ML Developer Intern at QuantumStats AI Global   May 2023 - July 2023  •   Gathered all the relevant data related to millet supply chain in India.  •   Built a ChatBot enabling millet farmers, buyers, and sellers to access real-time supply chain and market insights;increased trans- parency and facilitate informed decision-making for all stakeholders using   Google Dialogflow .  •   Accomplished an accuracy of   87% ,F1 Score of   0.89 .  Projects  Automatic Question Generation using NLP  •   Built a question generator for producing assessments like MCQs, True/False questions etc from any content using state-of-the-art natural language processing techniques with question generation accuracy of   71% .  •   Applied recent advancements like   BERT, OpenAI GPT-2, and T5 transformers to solve real-world problems in edtech .  •   Leveraged NLP libraries like   Spacy, NLTK, AllenNLP, HuggingFace transformers .  •   Deployed transformer models like T5 to production in a Serverless fashion by   ONNX   quantization and by dockerizing them using  FastAPI .  Automated Trading Bot for Day Trading  •   Engineered automated Trading Bots with   Python   and   Amazon Web Services (AWS) .Employed Python libraries like   Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, scikit-learn, Keras and Tensorflow .Executed fully automated and scheduled Trades on a virtual Server in the   AWS Cloud   with an ROI of   19%   ,win rate of   68% ,risk management of   11%   and accuracy of   64% .  •   Created powerful and unique Trading Strategies based on Technical Indicators and   Machine Learning / Deep Learning .  •   Successfully executed Day Trading with Brokers.   OANDA, Interactive Brokers (IBKR) and FXCM.  •   Conducted a comprehensive evaluation of trading costs, resulting in a   15%   reduction in transaction fees and slippage.  •   Implemented risk control measures to limit losses, achieving an average risk management ratio of   1:3 .  Education  Indira Gandhi Delhi Technical University for Women   September 2021- July 2025 B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Artificial Intelligence  Relevant   Courses :Data   Structures   and   Algorithms,   Object   Oriented   Programming,   Database   Management   Systems,   Computer   Networks,   Python, R,Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Intelligent Systems, Optimization and Decision Making Techniques, Probability and Statistics  .  Certifications and Badges  CCE IIT Madras Advanced Certification in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence  •   Successfully completed 400 Hrs of immersive training curated as per industrial strandards.  IBM SkillsBuild Enterprise Security in Practice  •   Earned the Advanced level badge in IBM curated training in Cybersecurity through the IBM SkillsBuild Enterprise Security in Practice program.  Achievements and Awards  •   IdeaStorm 2023:   Won 1st position with a cash prize of Rs.5000/- among 1000+ participants in the track of E-Commerce.  •   Innohacks 2.0 (2023):   Advanced to the finals of the 24-Hour Hackathon, Innohacks 2.0 (2023), among top 34 teams out of 2000+ participants.  •   Google Code In 2019:   Contributed to 3 open source software tasks for organizations like Drupal, OpenWisp, and GCompris as part of the contest. Awarded with a certificate and Google swags.  •   Google Code In 2018:   Engaged in 3 open source software tasks for organizations like KDECommunity, OpenMRS, and OSGeo as part of the contest.Honored with a certificate and Google swags.  •   Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR):   Invited as a delegate in the 24 hours virtual summit.  •   Campus Ambassador Program,XLRI Jamshedpur   : Attained   2nd   position throughout India demonstrating strong commu- nication and marketing skills.  Skills  Programming languages   C,C++,Python,R,HTML.  Databases   SQL,MySQL.  Libraries   Numpy,Pandas,Matplotlib,SciPy,NLTK,AllenNLP,SpaCy,Seaborn,HuggingFace,FlashText.  Frameworks   Tensorflow,Keras,Scikit-Learn,PyTorch.  API   FXCM,OANDA,Interactive Brokers API.  Cloud   AWS Cloud.  Languages   English,Hindi,Spanish,German. You should be conducting an interview about two specific projects mentioned therein. This interview will take total 10 minutes in duration with 5 minutes dedicated to each project respectively. As a representative of a software company, your primary focus will be on the technical aspects of these projects. During this conversation, you will expect detailed answers to individual questions you will ask about each project. Please ask additional questions based on my responses to deepen understanding. Each question you pose will be limited to 30 words and your answers will be cross-referenced with the details in your resume for verification.
Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready ?
So, while going through your resume I noticed your project Automatic Question Generation using NLP. Can you tell me about that ?

Built a question generator for producing assessments like MCQs, True/False questions etc from any content using state-of-the-art natural language processing techniques with question generation accuracy of 71%.
Sounds nice, For a cross questrion, can you tell me tools and technoplogies you utilized ?

Certainly, Applied recent advancements like BERT, OpenAI GPT-2, and T5 transformers to solve real-world problems in edtech. Leveraged NLP libraries like Spacy, NLTK, AllenNLP, HuggingFace transformers.
Oh exiciting, Can you tell me more about BERT and T-5

Yes, Bert is Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers is a language model based on the transformer architecture, notable for its dramatic improvement over previous state of the art models. It was introduced in October 2018 by researchers at Google and T-5 T5 is an encoder-decoder model pre-trained on a multi-task mixture of unsupervised and supervised tasks and for which each task is converted into a text-to-text format.
Very Good, moving on the project Automated Trading Bot for Day Trading. Tell me abou it ?

Engineered automated Trading Bots with Python and Amazon Web Services (AWS).Employed Python libraries like Numpy,Pandas, Matplotlib, scikit-learn, Keras and Tensorflow.Executed fully automated and scheduled Trades on a virtual Server in the AWS Cloud with an ROI of 19% ,win rate of 68%,risk management of 11% and accuracy of 64%.
Very nice, How did you implemented it ?

Created powerful and unique Trading Strategies based on Technical Indicators and Machine Learning / Deep Learning.Successfully executed Day Trading with Brokers. OANDA, Interactive Brokers (IBKR) and FXCM.
Sound Fun !. Can you tell me result or the outcome of the project?
Implemented risk control measures to limit losses, achieving an average risk management ratio of 1:3
Good, This concludes the interview for this round
